job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtThis team focuses specifically on site reliability as a service to the 4 LOBs in Consumer Lending Tech Mortgage Auto Card Personal Lending supporting more than 700 Apps in tandem with Engineering teams within those groupsltpgtltpgtltstronggtExampleltstronggtltpgtltpgtThey will need to understand and explain how to build CICD pipelines but will not be actually building them They will support deployment testing and production support They will MEASURE the performance throughout the lifecycle using different observability Splunk ElasticSearch etc and within various types of testing Load performance UAT Candidates should be able to explain the processltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThey will ask about Site reliability in general Can you explain Site Reliability and the types Answers like embedded and kitchen sink among others will be important to at least understand Other questions around how you measure and why as well as a request share example of problems solved andor customer satisfaction stories Another unique questionltpgtltpgtDo you know what Golden Signals are and the typesltpgtltpgtCandidates so they should understand concepts of the below and examples of experienceltpgtltulgtltligtCICD pipelinesltligtltligtObservabilityltligtltligtAutomationltligtltligtDeployment and production supportltligtltligtPlatform  AWS Azure PCPltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
